mapper.select: SELECT bnum, caname, title, writer, wdate, vcount, likes, isfileexist FROM ( SELECT SEQ, bnum, caname, title, writer, wdate, vcount, likes, isfileexist FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS seq, bnum, caname, title, writer, wdate, vcount, likes, isfileexist FROM ( SELECT * FROM board where bname=#{vo.bname} ORDER BY (case when caname = 'notice' then 1 else 2 end), bnum DESC ) ) WHERE SEQ >= (#{page}-1)*#{limit}+1 ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit}
